Base64

public struct Base64

Provides base-64 en-/decoding for the standard and url safe alphabet. Encoding and Decoding follows RFC4648 which means e.g. that an error is thrown if an encoded strings contains illegal characters. When decoding .urlSafe encoded strings padding characters are ignored.

  • decode(_:coding:)

    Decode a base64 encoded string.

    Throws

    Throws an Base64Error error.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public static func decode(_ string: String, coding: Base64Coding = .standard) throws -> Data?

    Parameters

    string

    The input string.
    coding

    The decoding standard. Defaults to .standard.

    Return Value

    The decoded data object.

  • encode(_:coding:padding:)

    Encode some data of type Data.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public static func encode(_ data: Data, coding: Base64Coding = .standard, padding: Base64Padding = .on) -> String?

    Parameters

    data

    The input data.
    coding

    The decoding standard. Defaults to .standard.
    padding

    Add padding character if necessary. Defaults to .on.

    Return Value

    A base64 encoded string. In case of failure nil.
